definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
to be known as/to be nicknamed/to be purportedly/to claim (often exaggeratedly or falsely)
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
character size/font size/fame/reputation/shop/name of a shop
characters and numbers (as used in a code)/alphanumeric code/serial number

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: These are remains of an abandoned radar station Chernobyl-2.
sentences.chinese: 这是切尔若贝利2号雷达站的遗迹。

sentences.english: Now why dost thou cry out aloud?
sentences.chinese: 现在你为何大声哭号呢。

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易条件与101号销售确认书中的规定相同。

sentences.english: Ark Angel now entering Earth orbit.
sentences.chinese: “方舟天使”号现在进入地球轨道。

sentences.english: Chang'e 1 Lunar orbiter will achieve the ancient dream of the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: “嫦娥1号”将完成的，是中国人的一个古老的梦想。

sentences.english: The Soyuz spacecraft appears at the bottom left.
sentences.chinese: 联盟号宇宙飞船出现在图片的左下方。

sentences.english: AF Flight No.123 is checking in at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 法航123号航班正在办理登机手续。

sentences.english: Ania lives at No. 34, Green Street.
sentences.chinese: 艾尼雅住在格林大街34号。

sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 那家报纸出版号外宣布战争结束的消息。

sentences.english: Number the books on the shelf please.
sentences.chinese: 请把架子上的书编上号。

sentences.english: Manchester City have decided to retire their number 23 shirt in tribute to Marc-Vivien Foe.
sentences.chinese: 曼城已经决定将福的23号球衣封存以祭奠他。

sentences.english: Well, we could consider not putting in item 0.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我们不用考虑0号物品了。

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡马克说号拒绝了许多优惠大出版商多年来。

definition: first day of the month/toilet/(slang) top (in a homosexual relationship)
the fifth/fifth day of a month
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
tonnage/class in tons (of a passenger ship)

pinyin: he2 dong4 li4 hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4
